content:
TITLE: Basic RedBeanPHP Book Object Storage
DESCRIPTION: Simple example demonstrating how to create and store a book object using RedBeanPHP's ORM functionality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gabordemooij/redbean/blob/master/README.markdown#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: php
CODE:
```
$book = R::dispense("book");
$book->author = "Santa Claus";
$book->title = "Secrets of Christmas";
$id = R::store( $book );
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing RedBeanPHP via Composer Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Composer configuration for installing RedBeanPHP ORM package. Specifies the package requirement in composer.json file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gabordemooij/redbean/blob/master/README.markdown#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
    "require": {
        "gabordemooij/redbean": "dev-master"
    }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining RedBeanPHP Model with Composer
DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a User model class with proper namespace handling when using RedBeanPHP through Composer installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gabordemooij/redbean/blob/master/README.markdown#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: php
CODE:
```
use \RedBeanPHP\R;

class User extends \RedBeanPHP\SimpleModel
{
    ...
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing RedBeanPHP R Class with Namespace
DESCRIPTION: PHP use statement to create an alias for the RedBeanPHP R class when using Composer autoloading.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gabordemooij/redbean/blob/master/README.markdown#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: php
CODE:
```
use \RedBeanPHP\R as R;
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing RedBean PHP Library
DESCRIPTION: Comment block instructing users to place the rb.php file in the current directory for RedBean installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gabordemooij/redbean/blob/master/testing/cli/testcontainer/put-rb-file-here.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
/*

Put the rb.php file in this directory

*/
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing PostgreSQL UUID Extension
DESCRIPTION: SQL command to enable the UUID-OSSP extension in PostgreSQL, required for RedBean tests. The postgres-contrib package must be installed first.
SOURCE: https://github.com/gabordemooij/redbean/blob/master/testing/notes.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sql
CODE:
```
CREATE EXTENSION "uuid-ossp";
```
